channel.title: Pi changing soul split
channel.description:
project insanity 317
ok so i am trying to change smite into soul split. anyway how can i make it so when your attacking with soul split every couple seconds u can see like 2 air bolts going into the opponite and coming back to you.
also make soul split heal some hp while smiting?

lmfao how. smite is just so boring/ my server alreaddy has turmoil might aswell add soul split i alrdy have all the images i think i just need the gfx and animation so when your in a fight it shows a white circle at the bottmo and like 2 bolts going into enemy and back into you as healing you and smiting opponite.
